nml_option.name: config_AM_geographicalVectors_enable
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member geographicalVectors is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_geographicalVectors_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often analysis member computation should be performed.

nml_option.name: config_AM_geographicalVectors_output_stream
nml_option.description: Name of the stream that the geographicalVectors analysis member should be tied to.

nml_option.name: config_AM_geographicalVectors_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_geographicalVectors_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member write occurs on start-up.

package.name: geographicalVectorsAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the geographicalVectors analysis member.

var.name: surfaceTiltForceUGeo
var.description: True eastwards sea surface tilt stress

var.name: surfaceTiltForceVGeo
var.description: True northwards sea surface tilt stress
